narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Continuum, LLC is a Durable Medical Equipment & Medical Supplies provider based in Philadelphia, PA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $72.1M in Medicaid payments across 1.0M claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $72.1M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
